story_parts.text: The lion was very excited to go to Disney World. He had always wanted to go there and see all the characters. He was especially excited to meet Mickey Mouse.

next_options.0: The lion was so excited to meet Mickey Mouse that he couldn't contain himself and started hugging him
next_options.1: The lion was so excited to meet Mickey Mouse that he started roaring and jumping around

story_parts.text: The lion was so excited to meet Mickey Mouse that he couldn't contain himself and started hugging him. Mickey Mouse was a little bit surprised at first, but then he saw how happy the lion was and he hugged him back.

next_options.0: The lion was so happy to finally meet Mickey Mouse that he started hugging him and wouldn't let go
next_options.1: Mickey Mouse was so surprised by the lion's enthusiasm that he hugged him back

quiz_parts.question: What was the lion's initial reaction upon meeting Mickey Mouse?

options.0: The lion was happy and started hugging Mickey Mouse.
options.1: The lion was scared and ran away.
options.2: The lion was sad and started crying.
options.3: The lion was surprised and just stood there.

options.1: Mickey Mouse was surprised to see the lion hugging him
